quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Although golf was originally restricted to wealthy, overweight Protestants, today it's open to anybody who owns hideous clothing
author: Dave Barry

quote: It took me seventeen years to get three thousand hits in baseball. It took one afternoon on the golf course.
author: Hank Aaron

quote: To find a mans true character, play golf with him.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Golf is a game whose aim is to hit a very small ball into an ever smaller hole, with weapons singularly ill-designed for the purpose
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Mistakes are part of the game. It's how well you recover from them, that's the mark of a great player.
author: Alice Cooper

quote: The income tax has made more liars out of the American people than golf has.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
author: Gerald Ford

quote: It is impossible to imagine Goethe or Beethoven being good at billiards or golf.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air.
author: Jack Benny

quote: I started watching golf for the first time yesterday. I`m really worried about myself. I was actually enjoying it.
author: Ewan McGregor

quote: It's considered good sportsmanship not to pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
author: Mark Twain

quote: They say golf is like life, but don’t believe them. Golf is more complicated than that.
author: Gardner Dickinson

quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty.
author: Harry Vardon

quote: It took me 17 years to get 3000 hits in baseball. I did it in one afternoon on the golf course.
author: Phil Callaway

quote: Golf sits in that beautiful junction between perfection and frustration.
author: Colleen Ferrary Bader

quote: Old Took’s great-grand-uncle Bullroarer, who was so huge (for a hobbit) that he could ride a horse. He charged the ranks of the goblins of Mount Gram in the Battle of the Green Fields, and knocked their king Golfimbul’s head clean off with a wooden club. It sailed a hundred yards through the air and went down a rabbit-hole, and in this way the battle was won and the game of Golf invented at the same moment.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien: The Hobbit

quote: There's a reason why golfers walk forward to their next shot. It's to move on.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: Golf is deceptively simple and endlessly complicated.
author: Arnold Palmer
